title: Rounding Trait Rarity % for GOLDZ Production Bonus
body:
## **Summary**

Switching rarities from Rarity Sniper to OpenSea


## **Abstract**

We strive to keep the experience with Feudalz as smooth and transparent as possible. We have been listening to our community stating a misunderstanding on the % of some traits and how they should reflect in their **GOLDZ production bonus.**

The GOLDZ production system, as it stands, works based on the Rarity Sniper rarity %, which gives us exact numbers.

This proposal which will be voted on by the community, seeks to change from Rarity Sniper to OpenSea's rarities %, which would be rounded down to the nearest whole number. This means that a few traits would have an increase on **GOLDZ production bonus.**


## **Specification**

The Feudalz team formally petitions all Holders to vote YES or NO on this Switch.

If majority vote for Yes, we are going to match OpenSea %
If majority vote for NO, we are going to keep as it is, using Rarity Sniper %.
author: 0xC00f4b8022e4DC7f086D703328247cb6aDF26858
